alert.note: Alert for Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A developing thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Norfolk, west central Plymouth, northwestern Bristol and northeastern Providence Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 515 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing thunderstorm over Woonsocket, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Brockton, Pawtucket, Taunton, Woonsocket, Cumberland, North Providence, North Attleborough, Stoughton, Bridgewater, Attleboro, Mansfield, Middleborough, Easton, Smithfield, Lincoln, Central Falls, Norton, Sharon, Foxborough and Bellingham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Northern Bristol; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
